Articles.Content:
Hello,

I'm relatively new to KSP and have been playing with mods, which I installed with CKAN, for a few days in career mode. Then, I made the mistake of trying to uninstall MechJeb 2 (and removed references to it from my save file), and that's when it all hit the fan. I'm not sure if that's what caused my issues, but I've since reinstalled MechJeb 2 and reverted to a backup save, but still cannot even load into a new game. I'd just love to get my saved game back (with or without MechJeb at this point).

 

Player.log file: https://gist.githubusercontent.com/elfin8er/ad96b62bb32720d8ba2585ecdd43c6ef/raw/a64aa0923b4b1c08325163fb46a2693b9991da91/Player.log

KSP.log file: https://gist.githubusercontent.com/elfin8er/6b8c57c69bdc8f1417c255a7cac409fd/raw/255a7a6e5d7da15220d71e4aee6f264c00504166/KSP.log

 

Thank in Advanced!

I did a binary search through my mods and determined that Spectra was what was causing my crashes. Uninstalling Spectra fixed the issue, and reinstalling it brought it back. I'm able to load my saved game now with Spectra uninstalled
